#include "graph_theory.hpp"
#include "main.hpp"
bool multitest{};
void main2() {
    I(n);I(m);
    vc<vl> g(n);
    vl u(m), v(m), col(m, 1);
    fo(i,m){
        cin>>u[i]>>v[i];
        --u[i];--v[i];
        g[u[i]].pb(v[i]);
    }
    dfs d{g};
    d();
    vl pos(n);
    fo(i,n){
        pos[d.q[i]] = i;
    }
    fo(i,m){
        col[i] = 1+(pos[u[i]] > pos[v[i]]);
    }
    cout<<*max_element(al(col))<<endl;;
    for(auto x:col){cout<<x<<" ";}
    cout<<endl;
}
